title: Bannon’s Homeschool Army, Cop Some Jordan’s (Underwear) 9.29.21
itunes:title: Bannon’s Homeschool Army, Cop Some Jordan’s (Underwear) 9.29.21
description:
In episode 998, Jack and Miles are joined by host of the Space Cave podcast David Huntsberger to discuss the shitshow on the hill, are you fan enough to buy use underwear? Steve Bannon and the homeschooling culture war and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Bit of a shitshow on the Hill…
  2. Even Before Steve Bannon, Homeschooling Was a Part of the Culture Wars
  3. Are you fan enough to buy used underwear? 
  4. Deb Never - Coca Cola

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
